thread.title: TransNational Partners with ShopKeep to Provide Integrated Payment Solutions for Small Businesses
thread.title_full: TransNational Partners with ShopKeep to Provide Integrated Payment Solutions for Small Businesses - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: TransNational Partners with ShopKeep to Provide Integrated Payment Solutions for Small Businesses
text:
TransNational Partners with ShopKeep to Provide Integrated Payment Solutions for Small Businesses
Rosemont, IL, September 03, 2015 --( PR.com )-- TransNational, an industry leader in payment processing and merchant services, has announced its most recent partnership with ShopKeep, a cloud-based technology provider trusted by nearly 18,000 small businesses across the country.
TransNational and ShopKeep’s partnership will provide businesses, both large and small, with a powerful cloud-based point-of-sale system, in addition to a secure credit card processor. Both companies strive to help business owners simplify their back-end, day-to-day tasks, allowing them to focus on broader operations such as driving sales and revenue. As both brands are aligned in this mission, the partnership will provide merchants with an even more intuitive and simplified payments solution.
“ShopKeep was established by a small business owner who understands the pain points of merchants, and created an intuitive point of sales system to help businesses run smarter businesses,” said Norm Merritt, ShopKeep’s CEO and President. “With this partnership, we are joining forces with a company that has a great reputation in the Chicagoland area and across the country for providing payment processing services to merchants that will help us in furthering our mission.”
TransNational and ShopKeep will work closely to provide customers with unparalleled levels of service and support. As new technologies emerge every day, it’s important for small businesses to stay up-to-date on the latest developments, and both of these companies serve as valued partners for these merchants. While TransNational provides processing capabilities that align with the rapid changes in the industry, ShopKeep provides 24/7-customer support, front and back-end analytics and marketing software integrations, allowing merchants to have all their needs in just one place.
“We’re excited to provide our sales representatives with a business management tool, that will help further position them as champions for small businesses,” said Jae Haas, President of TransNational. “Merchants using an integrated POS solution benefit the most from the tools that both companies will be offering them allowing them to grow and succeed.”
About TransNational
Headquartered in Rosemont, IL, TransNational is an industry leader in innovative payment solutions and merchant services. Founded in 1999 to be an ethical and full disclosure option in the bankcard industry, TransNational has enjoyed strong growth over the past decade. TransNational provides a wide array of products to fit each business, large or small, including credit and debit card processing, payment gateway, wireless and mobile processing, point of sale systems, gift/loyalty programs, and check services. Maintaining an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau, TransNational is a five-time BBB Torch Award nominee for Marketplace Ethics. They’ve also been honored three consecutive years with the Chicago Tribune’s Top 100 Workplace award.
About ShopKeep
Everything ShopKeep does supports growing and independent businesses. Founded by a successful business owner, ShopKeep provides an intuitive, secure, iPad-based point-of-sale system and empowers merchants to run smarter businesses by optimizing staffing, regulating inventory and accessing sales reports and customer information on one seamless, cloud-based platform. With more than 18,000 customers, ShopKeep’s award-winning customer care team is available to help 24/7 and provide a robust support network for growing business owners. ShopKeep was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New York, with offices in Portland, Chicago, Washington, D.C., Belfast and London. Follow @ShopKeep on Twitter, join the discussion on the ShopKeep blog or visit www.shopkeep.com to learn more.
For more information and media inquiries, please contact:
Kristin Spiewak
Marketing Director
